Subnets.Description: The list of SubnetIds in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
Subnets.ConstraintDescription: must be a list of an existing subnets in the selected Virtual Private Cloud.

Zones.Description: The list of AvailabilityZones for your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
Zones.ConstraintDescription: must be a list if valid EC2 availability zones for the selected Virtual Private Cloud

VpcId.Description: VpcId of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
VpcId.ConstraintDescription: Must be the VPC Id of an existing Virtual Private Cloud.
